glBegin(GL_QUADS);
	glVertex3f(1.000000,1.000000,-1.540123);
	glVertex3f(1.000000,-1.000000,-1.540123);
	glVertex3f(1.000000,1.000000,1.540123);
	glVertex3f(1.000000,-1.000000,1.540123);
	glVertex3f(-1.000000,1.000000,-1.540123);
	glVertex3f(-1.000000,-1.000000,-1.540123);
	glVertex3f(-1.000000,1.000000,1.540123);
	glVertex3f(-1.000000,-1.000000,1.540123);
glEnd();
